name: Gari Simulator
description:
What if there was a job where you collect garbage with the chance of dying?

How Play

  • To hold the garbage use "E" or "SPACE"
  • Throw the garbage in the trash bin
  • If have too much garbage in the city, you lose
  • Have fun!

A Game By

Luiz Felipe Bustamante

Lucas Morgado - itch.io
